thread.title: Revive ’85 Rally held Wednesday at Power & Light
thread.title_full: Revive ’85 Rally held Wednesday at Power & Light - KCTV5

author: Laura McCallister, Multimedia Producer
title: Revive ’85 Rally held Wednesday at Power & Light
text:
KANSAS CITY, MO (KCTV) - To celebrate the 1985 World Champion Kansas City Royals and cheer on the 2015 American Central Division Champion Royals as they head to the playoffs, a rally will be held Wednesday.
The Revive '85 Rally will be held from 11:30 a.m. to 1:30 p.m. at Kansas City Power & Light District KC Live! Block.
The event is hosted by Jackson County and Sports Radio 810 WHB.
Royals alumni who will be in attendance include (*Member of 1985 World Championship Team):
Frank White* Willie Wilson* Dennis Leonard* Danny Jackson* Al Fitzmorris Willie Aikens John Mayberry The first 400 attendees will get a free T-shirt. There will also be ballpark food vouchers, live interviews with alumni and autograph sessions.
